value:
This is the first time I've seen any
of these texts! This castle's library
is a trove. I could peruse forever!

I'm sure everyone back home must
think I'm back to my old habits again.
Hopefully I won't be away too long...

When I touch my hair, I can't help
but think of my wife, as she combs
my hair each morning...$k$pDo you have plans to settle down
anytime soon, Summoner?

I've added candlesticks to the room
to improve the light. Care to join me
as I examine these texts?

Ah! Have you been there long? My
apologies. I was absorbed in my work.

I am Pent, Count Reglay of Etruria.
I've been entrusted with giving you
this, from $Nf.

The magical energy is surging through
me! This may be imprudent, but my
heart is racing...

Hm. Well, this seems about right,
I suppose.

My apologies. I will endeavor not
to make the same mistake again.

Is this the result of your research?
Rather impressive, I must say.

I am Pent. In my country, I am known
as the Mage General, but here, I am
but a mere seeker. It is my pleasure.

My, but those techniques our foe
used last battle were astounding.
I'd practically stopped to gape!$k$pI nearly suffered a direct hit for my
curiosity. I simply wanted to see such
an incredible ability up close...$k$pHad it not been for your support,
there is no telling what fate might
have befallen me. Thank you, truly.$k$pThough, at times intellectual pursuits
demand one puts their own life at
risk. You understand, don't you?$k$pYour eyes share the gleam I see in
the mirror. I must ask... How would
you wish to see the world shaped?$k$pOnce we reach the end of our path
here together, I would love for us to
discuss it—and in some depth.
はっ！
せやっ！
うああっ！
困ったね…
Excuse me.
I'd rather not hurt you.
I'll accept your surrender.
Sorry about this.
I let my guard down... I'm sorry...
ふっ
I am Pent, Count Reglay of Etruria.
Hah! What a peculiar way of greeting people...
Even if I told the people back home about the power of a summoner, no one would believe me.
Being away from my home for long periods of time is nothing new for me. I doubt anyone will be upset.
In this world, there are many mysterious things that fall beyond our realm of understanding...
If something out there is guiding me, I have no choice other than to bow to the dictates of fate...
It seems the fate of this world rests on your shoulders.
Of course.
As you command.
Lead on.
